item.title: Tasha add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I think the only way to get through this life is laughing hard and constantly, mostly at myself." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Tasha add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "When I was a child, adults would tell me not to make things up, warning me of what would happen if I did. As far as I can tell so far, it seems to involve lots of foreign travel and not having to get up too early in the morning." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: "No misfortune is so bad that whining about it wonâ€™t make it worse. (Apr 2007 Gen Conf)" -- Jeffrey R. Holland

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description:
"You see, that is the sad, sorry, terrible thing about sarcasm.
It's really funny." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "By now, it is probably very late at night, and you have stayed up to read this book when you should have gone to sleep. If this is the case, then I commend you for falling into my trap. It is a writer's greatest pleasure to hear that someone was kept up until the unholy hours of the morning reading one of his books. It goes back to authors being terrible people who delight in the suffering of others. Plus, we get a kickback from the caffeine industry..." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "Personally, I say, "Out of the frying pan and into the deadly pit filled with sharks who are wielding chainsaws with killer kittens stapled to them." However, that one's having a rough time catching on." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "If you don't believe what I'm telling you, then ask yourself this: would any decent, kind-hearted individual become a writer? Of course not." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Tasha add a quote by John Champlin Gardner
item.description: "Art, of course, is a way of thinking, a way of mining reality." -- John Champlin Gardner

item.title: Tasha add a quote by John Champlin Gardner Jr.
item.description: "As a rule of thumb I say, if Socrates, Jesus and Tolstoy wouldn't do it, don't." -- John Champlin Gardner Jr.

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Fiction is the truth inside the lie." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you want to be a writer, you must do two things above all others: read a lot and write a lot." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Ally Condie
item.description: "Every minute you spend with someone gives them a part of your life and takes part of theirs." -- Ally Condie

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Roman Payne
item.description: "From all that I saw, and everywhere I wandered, I learned that time cannot be spent. It can only be squandered." -- Roman Payne

item.title: Tasha add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "Life, like classical music, is full of difficult passages that are conquered as much through endurance and determination as through any particular skill." -- Sheri L. Dew
